mapper.select: SELECT maj_code, exp_num, exp_title, appl_date, appr_state FROM expreport WHERE emp_id = #{empId} GROUP BY exp_num ORDER BY exp_num DESC
SELECT maj_code, exp_num, exp_title, appl_date, appr_state FROM expreport WHERE appr_id = #{expId} GROUP BY exp_num ORDER BY exp_num DESC

select exp_num,emp_table.emp_name, appr, pstn_code.job_name, hdqrt_code.hq_name, dep_code.dep_name , appl_date, exp_title, att_file, appr_state, det_code, remk, com_acc, expense, appr_date FROM expreport INNER JOIN emp_table ON expreport.emp_id = emp_table.emp_id INNER JOIN pstn_code ON pstn_code.job_code = emp_table.job_code INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = emp_table.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = emp_table.dep_no WHERE exp_num = #{expNum};

SELECT emp_id,hdqrt_code.hq_name,dep_code.dep_name,pstn_code.job_name, emp_name FROM emp_table as aa INNER JOIN pstn_code ON pstn_code.job_code = aa.job_code INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = aa.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = aa.dep_no WHERE aa.auth_code = "SJAU_0004" and aa.res_yn="n"

SELECT emp_id, emp_name, hdqrt_code.hq_name, dep_code.dep_name FROM emp_table as bb INNER JOIN hdqrt_code ON hdqrt_code.hq_code = bb.hq_code INNER JOIN dep_code ON dep_code.dep_no = bb.dep_no WHERE bb.emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.update: update expreport set exp_num = (SELECT concat("SJCD-",LPAD((MAX(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(exp_num,6,10),signed integer)))+1,4,0)) from (SELECT * from expreport) as a) where exp_num is null
